<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hell Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3047)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A hell hound's appearance dismisses any doubts as to their infernal origins— flesh the color of burning pitch, teeth as sharp as any fiend's pitchfork, and a shroud of ever-burning hellfire are all trademark features.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Hell_Hound.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Hell Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3047)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=547" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=600" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=604" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 194 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 40

</row>

**Immunities**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604)

**Weaknesses**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +13 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing plus 1d6 fire

**Hellfire Breath** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)) The hell hound breathes flames that deal 4d6 fire damage to all creatures in a 15-foot cone (DC 19 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The hell hound can't use Hellfire Breath again for 1d4 rounds. If the hell hound would take fire damage or be targeted by a [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) effect, their Hellfire Breath recharges.

**Pack Attack**   The hell hound's Strikes deal 1d4 extra damage to creatures within the reach of at least two of the hell hounds' allies.

</column>
